doc:
Selene Johnson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selene_Johnson 0 Selene Johnson (February 20, 1876 – December 11, 1960) was an American stage and silent film actress born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania (USA) as Selene Knapp Johnson. She is known for her role in the play The Squaw Man and other roles in silent cinema as: The Divine Sacrifice (1918).She was married to Lumsden Hare and she died in Los Angeles, California, USA. Selene_Johnson ( February_20_,_1876 – December_11_,_1960 ) was an_American_stage and silent_film_actress born in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania ( USA ) as Selene_Knapp_Johnson . She is_known for her_role in the_play The_Squaw_Man and other_roles in silent_cinema as : The_Divine_Sacrifice_(_1918_) . She was_married to Lumsden_Hare and she died in Los_Angeles , California , USA .
